## Vector3.GetClipFactor() method

Get the clip factor between two vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static GetClipFactor(vector0: ReadOnlyVector3, vector1: ReadOnlyVector3, axis: ReadOnlyVector3, size: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector0 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the first operand |
|  vector1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second operand |
|  axis | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the axis to use |
|  size | <code>number</code> | defines the size along the axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the clip factor
